file_content.text: <<1>> Phase. Your groupmates can help you if they are not a <<1>>, or if they select "Allow access to same-class story areas" in the Preference window.
You are entering <<1>>'s Class Phase. You can help <<1>>, but your own missions will not progress while you remain in <<1>>'s Phase.
OK
Don't tell me this again.
Interact with the objective control points to secure control of the defense turrets.
Defense turrets fire at the opposing faction's ship.
Inflict enough damage to the enemy ship to destroy it and achieve victory.
Interact with the ball to pick it up from the stand.
Pass the ball to allies using the 'Throw Ball' ability.
Carry the ball over the ENEMY goal line to score.
Attacker: Interact with the doors to plant the bombs. Defender: Prevent the bombs from being planted.
Attacker: Defend the bombs until the doors are destroyed. Defender: Interact with the bombs to defuse them.
Attacker: Interact with the datacore terminal. Defender: Protect the datacore terminal.
You must escort this shuttle to the end of the mission. If it is destroyed, the mission is failed.
Make sure the shuttle arrives safely at this destination.
Destroy fighters to help save the shuttle.
Avoid fire from enemy frigates.
Destroy 3 antenna arrays.
Destroy 2 shield generators.
Destroy 12 turrets.
Destroy 3 hangar bays.
Destroy 5 elite fighters.
Destroy this enemy boss ship when it appears during the mission.
Destroying fighters and frigate turrets will help you succeed at a bonus mission.
Avoid fire from this enemy destroyer near the end of the mission.
You must escort this shuttle to the end of the mission. If it is destroyed, the mission is failed.
Make sure the shuttle arrives safely at this destination.
Destroy fighters to help save the shuttle.
Avoid fire from enemy frigates.
Destroy 5 elite fighters.
Destroy this enemy boss ship when it appears during the mission.
Destroying fighters and frigate turrets will help you succeed at a bonus mission.
Avoid fire from this enemy destroyer near the end of the mission.
Interact with the artillery targeting computer to begin reprogramming it (note multiple allies may interact at once to speed up the process).
Each defensive bunker is equipped with regenerative shields. Use one turret to disable the shield and second turret to damage the bunker.
Inflict enough damage to the enemy bunker to destroy it and achieve victory.
Pylons at each end of the mission zone power the hypergates controlled by each team. Capture these pylons to increase power to your team's hypergate and achieve victory!
Increase the pylons' energy charge by defeating enemy players, or by gathering energy orbs from the central safe zone and depositing them at a captured pylon.
Watch out! When the pylons discharge their energy into the hypergates, they also release a deadly shockwave. Take cover in the central shelter zone to survive!
Be the Last Team Standing! Go berserk!
Best of Three Rounds!
No revives during the Round! Once you are down, you are out for the Round!
The Lost Shipyards contains three satellites. Taking control of these satellites continually increases your team's score.

The color of a satellite's lights indicate its current status:
White: Neutral Red:Enemy controlled Green: Ally controlled
To capture enemy satellites, destroy their defense turrets, eliminate nearby enemies, and remain close while control transitions.
Kuat Mesas contains three satellites. Taking control of these satellites continually increases your team's score.
You have just one objective: destroy the enemy. Each kill is one point for your team. The team that gets the most kills wins!
Collect the powerups scattered throughout the area to give your ship a temporary, but significant combat advantage.

Powerup types:
Yellow: Blaster Enhancement
Purple: Engine Enhancement
Blue: Shield Enhancement
Red: Damage Enhancement
Use the Grapple Blaster tables to quickly move to the center platform.
Denon Exosphere contains three satellites. Taking control of these satellites continually increases your team's score.
You are entering your own Personal Phase. Your groupmates can help you if they enable the social preference to allow access to the same class/personal phases.
You are entering <<1>>'s Solo Phase. You can help <<1>> but your own quests will not progress while you remain in <<1>>'s Phase.
Capture an active Control Point for your team by standing in a holo-area.
Every second of control scores points for your team.
Seek out powerful Battle Mods that can turn the tide of the exercise.
Defense turrets fire at the opposing team's ship.
Inflict enough damage to the enemy ship to destroy it and kill enemies to achieve victory.
Interact with the ball to pick it up from the stand. Carry the ball over the ENEMY goal line to score.
Use the Gravity Grapple to save yourself from falling or while on special platforms to move around faster than normal!
